original_text: My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret, and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth.
korean_text: 내가 은밀한 데서 지음을 받고 땅의 깊은 곳에서 기이하게 지음을 받은 때에 나의 형체가 주의 앞에 숨겨지지 못하였나이다

sentences.original_text: My substance was not hid from thee
when I was made in secret
in the lowest parts of the earth
